synopsis.text: Watanabe, a respected section chief, is about to leave his position, leaving his dedicated employee, Mitsuki Hattori, in a state of melancholy. Mitsuki, who has always prioritized her work over her personal appearance, has harbored a secret admiration for Watanabe and dreams of becoming his right-hand woman. In a desperate bid to catch his attention and show him a different side of herself before he departs, Mitsuki embarks on a journey to transform her appearance and reveal the beauty hidden beneath her work-focused exterior. This heartwarming tale explores the life of an office worker and her determination to make a lasting impression on the person she admires.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
